title: I'm short 5 worlds tokens to get Ashe icon...
body: Is there anything that can be done to help me? Returning a mission that I missed? Would just feel crappy to miss the icon by 5 tokens :(

replies.body: Luckily we've still got some time left to finish up these missions! Looks like you still have the Turret Seige mission which will give you 10 tokens once it's finished, still a few hours left for it!!
I take it back, I didn't know you could get it in ARAM... my bad. Just earned it. Thanks for taking the time to respond anyway. It's appreciated!
And for those who realized too late (like now that the missions are gone..) is there anything I can do to get my 5 missing Tokens? {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
Although they were set to expire recently, those missions were up for about a week so everyone should have had plenty of time to work towards them.
I know, but that is an intensely team focused mission, and I have no team... even if I did, the chances of pulling that one off are really slim... :(
